trans-unit.source: Unit Testing in .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 中的单元测试

trans-unit.source: Unit Testing in .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 中的单元测试

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Unit Testing in .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 中的单元测试

trans-unit.source: By [Steve Smith](http://ardalis.com) and [Bill Wagner](https://github.com/BillWagner)
trans-unit.target: 作者：[Steve Smith](http://ardalis.com) 和 [Bill Wagner](https://github.com/BillWagner)

trans-unit.source: .NET Core has been designed with testability in mind, so that creating unit tests for your applications is easier than ever before.
trans-unit.target: 由于在设计 .NET Core 时考虑到了可测试性，因此为应用程序创建单元测试比以往更加简单。

trans-unit.source: This article briefly introduces unit tests (and how they differ from other kinds of tests).
trans-unit.target: 本文简要介绍了单元测试（以及与其他类型测试的不同之处）。

trans-unit.source: Linked resources demonstrates how to add a test project to your solution and then run unit tests using either the command line or Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 链接的资源演示了如何将测试项目添加到解决方案，然后使用命令行或 Visual Studio 运行单元测试。

trans-unit.source: Getting Started with Testing
trans-unit.target: 测试入门

trans-unit.source: Having a suite of automated tests is one of the best ways to ensure a software application does what its authors intended it to do.
trans-unit.target: 确保软件应用程序按作者的期望执行操作，其中最好的一种方法是拥有自动化测试套件。

trans-unit.source: There are many different kinds of tests for software applications, including integration tests, web tests, load tests, and many others.
trans-unit.target: 有多种用于软件应用程序的不同测试，包括集成测试、Web 测试、负载测试等其他许多测试。

trans-unit.source: At the lowest level are unit tests, which test individual software components or methods.
trans-unit.target: 最低级别的测试为单元测试，此测试用于测试个人软件组件或方法。

trans-unit.source: Unit tests should only test code within the developer’s control, and should not test infrastructure concerns, like databases, file systems, or network resources.
trans-unit.target: 单元测试只应测试开发人员控件中的代码，而不应测试基础结构问题，如数据库、文件系统或网络资源等。

trans-unit.source: Unit tests may be written using [Test Driven Development (TDD)](http://deviq.com/test-driven-development/), or they can be added to existing code to confirm its correctness.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用[测试驱动开发 (TDD)](http://deviq.com/test-driven-development/) 编写单元测试，或将其添加到现有代码以确认其正确性。

trans-unit.source: In either case, they should be small, well-named, and fast, since ideally you will want to be able to run hundreds of them before pushing your changes into the project’s shared code repository.
trans-unit.target: 无论哪种情况，单元测试都应该是良好命名、快捷的小型测试，因为在理想情况下，希望能够在将更改推送到项目的共享代码存储库之前运行数百个单元测试。

trans-unit.source: Developers often struggle with coming up with good names for their test classes and methods.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员经常要想方设法地为测试类和方法提供合适的名称。

trans-unit.source: As a starting point, the ASP.NET product team follows [these conventions](https://github.com/aspnet/Home/wiki/Engineering-guidelines#unit-tests-and-functional-tests).
trans-unit.target: 作为起点，ASP.NET 产品团队会遵循[这些约定](https://github.com/aspnet/Home/wiki/Engineering-guidelines#unit-tests-and-functional-tests)。

trans-unit.source: When writing unit tests, be careful you don’t accidentally introduce dependencies on infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 编写单元测试时，注意不要在基础结构上意外引入了依赖项。

trans-unit.source: These tend to make tests slower and more brittle, and thus should be reserved for integration tests.
trans-unit.target: 这些依赖项往往会降低测试速度，使测试更加脆弱，因此应将其保留供集成测试使用。

trans-unit.source: You can avoid these hidden dependencies in your application code by following the [Explicit Dependencies Principle](http://deviq.com/explicit-dependencies-principle/) and using [Dependency Injection](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/fundamentals/dependency-injection) to request your dependencies from the framework.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过遵循 [Explicit Dependencies Principle](http://deviq.com/explicit-dependencies-principle/)（显示依赖项原则）和使用 [Dependency Injection](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/fundamentals/dependency-injection)（依赖项注入）从框架中请求依赖项，以此避免应用程序代码中的这些隐藏依赖项。

trans-unit.source: You can also keep your unit tests in a separate project from your integration tests, and ensure your unit test project doesn’t have references to or dependencies on infrastructure packages.
trans-unit.target: 还可以将单元测试保留在单独的项目中，与集成测试相分隔，并确保单元测试项目没有引用或依赖于基础结构包。

trans-unit.source: Learn more about unit testing in .NET Core projects:
trans-unit.target: 了解有关 .NET Core 项目中的单元测试的详细信息：

trans-unit.source: Try this [walkthrough creating unit tests with xunit and the .NET CLI](unit-testing-with-dotnet-test.md).
trans-unit.target: 请尝试[使用 xunit 和 .NET CLI 创建单元测试的演练](unit-testing-with-dotnet-test.md)。

trans-unit.source: The XUnit team has written a tutorial that shows [how to use xunit with .NET Core and Visual Studio](http://xunit.github.io/docs/getting-started-dotnet-core.html).
trans-unit.target: XUnit 团队编写了说明[如何将 xunit 与 .NET Core 和 Visual Studio 配合使用](http://xunit.github.io/docs/getting-started-dotnet-core.html)的教程。
